    • create

      public Camp create(CampList campList, String campID, String campDateStart, String campDateEnd, String registrationDeadline, String faculty, boolean openToNTU, String location, int totalSlots, int emptySlots, int committeeSlots, String info, String staffIC, boolean isVisible)
      Create Camp
      Specified by:
      create in interface ICreateCamp
      Parameters:
      campList - Array list of camp(s)
      campID - Camp's name
      campDateStart - Camp's start date in (YYYY-MM-DD)
      campDateEnd - Camp's end date in (YYYY-MM-DD)
      registrationDeadline - Camp's registrationdeadline in (YYYY-MM-DD)
      faculty - Which faculty this Camp is open to
      openToNTU - Determines if this Camp will be opened to whole of NTU
      location - Location of where this Camp will be held at
      totalSlots - Stores total slots of this Camp
      emptySlots - Stores total empty slots of this Camp
      committeeSlots - Stores total Committe slots of this Camp
      info - Stores description of the Camp
      staffIC - Stores which Staff creats this camp
      isVisible - Determines if this Camp will be visible to students
      Returns:
      Camp object
